description: A mysterious fog near Ruluka Island that serves as a gateway to another dimension. The Rainbow Mist traps ships and crews in a space-time anomaly where time passes differently than in the normal world.

keyEvents.title: Den Den Mushi Communication Established
keyEvents.description: The discovery that Den Den Mushi can connect the Rainbow Mist dimension to the outside world.
keyEvents.significance: Reveals that the Rainbow Mist maintains some connection to the normal world despite being a separate dimension.

keyEvents.title: Spatial Distortion Discovered
keyEvents.description: The crew discovers that space is distorted within the Rainbow Mist, creating closed loops that make escape nearly impossible.
keyEvents.significance: Explains why the Rainbow Mist is so dangerous and why ships become trapped indefinitely.

keyEvents.title: Sea King Appears in the Mist
keyEvents.description: A massive Sea King appears before Nami and Sanji as they attempt to enter the Rainbow Mist.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the dangers lurking within the dimensional anomaly.

statusHistory.reason: The Rainbow Mist phenomenon is active during the Ruluka Island Arc

description: A sub-dimensional space within the Rainbow Mist that serves as a ship graveyard. It is impossible to escape unless the Rainbow Tower is used to open it from the outside. The space exhibits unusual properties including spatial distortion that creates closed loops.

keyEvents.title: Henzo's Dream
keyEvents.description: Henzo dreams about his childhood with the Pumpkin Pirates while trapped in Ape's Concert.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the psychological impact of being trapped in this strange dimension.

keyEvents.title: Spatial Distortion Revealed
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats discover that Ape's Concert has spatial distortion that causes them to travel in circles.
keyEvents.significance: Explains why ships cannot escape this dimensional pocket - the space loops back on itself.

keyEvents.title: Sea King Encounter
keyEvents.description: The Pumpkin Pirates encounter and fight a Sea King within the ship graveyard.
keyEvents.significance: Shows that dangerous creatures inhabit this dimension.

statusHistory.reason: The dimensional space exists as long as the Rainbow Mist phenomenon is active

description: An island in Paradise governed by the tyrannical mayor Wetton, a former pirate. The island is known for the Rainbow Mist phenomenon that occurs nearby and for the massive Rainbow Tower being constructed to access the mist.

keyEvents.title: Wetton's Extortion
keyEvents.description: Wetton demands 10,000,000 Beli from the Straw Hats for permission to enter the Rainbow Mist.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates Wetton's greed and control over the island.

keyEvents.title: Nami's Escape
keyEvents.description: Nami, Sanji, and Chopper flee from Ruluka Island after obtaining the safety device to enter the Rainbow Mist.
keyEvents.significance: The separated Straw Hats begin their journey to reunite with their crew.

statusHistory.reason: Island is under Wetton's tyrannical rule during the arc

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' first ship, currently trapped within the Rainbow Mist's Ape's Concert dimension.

keyEvents.title: Rapanui Boards the Going Merry
keyEvents.description: Rapanui boards the Going Merry to rescue Pukau from what he believes is a hostage situation.
keyEvents.significance: The Going Merry becomes the setting for the confrontation between Rapanui and the Straw Hats.

keyEvents.title: Spatial Distortion Testing
keyEvents.description: The crew uses the Going Merry to test the spatial distortion by shooting cannons and observing their circular path.
keyEvents.significance: The ship serves as a mobile laboratory for understanding the Rainbow Mist's properties.
